cards.helpDesc: We raise funds and organise activities to truly help children and people in need.
cards.businessDesc: We connect companies and people, creating networking and cooperation space.
cards.communityDesc: We build relationships, organise events and connect Poles in Barcelona and surroundings.
cards.cultureDesc: We showcase Polish culture and values, co-creating Barcelona's colourful mosaic.

finalSection.title: 34th WO≈öP Finale ‚Äî Healthy tummies for our kids

contactSection.title: Contact us

about.title: About us
about.mission: Our mission is to help children and seniors through the organization of charity events in Barcelona.
about.history: We have been supporting the Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity for 9 years, raising funds for the most important goals.

missionCards.title: Supporting those most in need
missionCards.description: We raise funds and organize actions to help the most vulnerable children and elderly. Every zloty goes directly to Polish hospitals for the purchase of modern medical equipment.

missionCards.title: Supporting local businesses
missionCards.description: We connect companies and people, creating space for cooperation. Our partners include Polish companies in Catalonia and local entrepreneurs who want to help and reach new audiences.

missionCards.title: Integration of the Polish community
missionCards.description: We build relationships and organize events that connect Poles in and around Barcelona. It's a meeting place for newcomers, students, and anyone looking for Polish connections.

missionCards.title: Promoting Polish culture in Spain
missionCards.description: We showcase the beauty of Polish culture, art, and traditions. During our finals, we host artists from Poland, and participants can taste Polish cuisine and drinks. Every year, more and more Poles, Catalans, and people from around the world come to experience 'Cultura Polaca' at our final event.

wospHistory.title: History of WO≈öP
wospHistory.content: The Great Orchestra of Christmas Charity (WO≈öP) is the largest charity organization in Poland, founded in 1993 by Jerzy Owsiak. Over 30 years of activity, it has raised over 2 billion zloty for medical purposes.
wospHistory.events: Every January, WO≈öP Finals take place across Poland and around the world ‚Äì the largest charity events that unite millions of people for one goal: saving the lives and health of children and the elderly.

medicalGoals.title: Medical Goals
medicalGoals.content: WO≈öP finances the purchase of the most modern medical equipment for Polish hospitals. Each year has its specific medical goal ‚Äì from pediatric cardiac surgery, through oncology, to geriatrics.
medicalGoals.impact: Thanks to WO≈öP, Polish hospitals have received thousands of devices: from ventilators, through CT scanners, to modern operating rooms. This is tangible help that saves lives every day.

jurek.title: Jerzy Owsiak and the Foundation
jurek.content: Jerzy Owsiak, founder and president of the WO≈öP Foundation, is one of the most recognizable figures in Polish social life. A journalist, social activist, and visionary who for decades has been building a social movement based on kindness and help.
jurek.transparency: The WO≈öP Foundation operates transparently ‚Äì every zloty is accounted for publicly. It's an organization that has changed the face of Polish pediatric and geriatric medicine, equipping hospitals with billions of zloty worth of equipment.

barcelonaSection.title: WO≈öP Barcelona
barcelonaSection.subtitle: For over 9 years we have been building in Barcelona a unique place where Polish energy and Spanish temperament unite to help.

paragraphs.season1: The WO≈öP season runs from early December to the end of January ‚Äì these are the two most intense months of the year. During this time, we set up our team and meet regularly with the same core group of people.
paragraphs.season2: After the Finale, usually in February, our team disbands and a new one is formed each year. That's why you might not hear much from us between February and November ‚Äì that's when we return to our families and daily routines.
paragraphs.season3: We often organize internal volunteer meetings during this time to discuss what worked well that year and what we can improve.
paragraphs.volunteers1: We have volunteers who have been with us for years, but we also welcome new people who have just moved to the area and are looking to connect with the Polish community.
paragraphs.volunteers2: We invite students who often help us as part of their internships, which is very helpful during the Finale organization. We welcome all help ‚Äì even one-time assistance!
paragraphs.volunteers3: We encourage everyone who wants to help, make new friends, or simply be part of the volunteer community to join us.
paragraphs.partners1: We collaborate with many Polish and local Catalan companies. Our main partner, World Class Barcelona, started with WO≈öP in Barcelona and now focuses on developing their Spanish language school, but they always support us!
paragraphs.partners2: Another key partner is Kosmo Hispano ‚Äì a Polish language school for children that helps us organizationally and always organizes various events for children, like Christmas and St. Andrew's Day parties.
paragraphs.partners3: We often meet at the Krakoviak restaurant, which is another one of our main sponsors and supports us from the kitchen!
paragraphs.partners4: All the funds we raise come from sponsors ‚Äì mostly local ones. We don't have our own funds ‚Äì everything we have comes from sponsors. We're very grateful to them because without them, the Finales wouldn't happen!

final33Section.title: 33rd WO≈öP Finale in Barcelona
final33Section.intro: In January 2025 we organised the 33rd WO≈öP Finale in Barcelona. It was our best Finale so far!
final33Section.medicalDesc: The 33rd Finale was dedicated to palliative and hospice medicine. The funds raised were used to purchase medical equipment that helps ensure a dignified life and death for patients in their most difficult moments.
final33Section.photoCreditThanks: Thank you for capturing the wonderful moments from our 33rd Finale!

7.title: Online Volunteer Meeting
7.description: Online meeting for WO≈öP Barcelona volunteers. Contact us through the contact form to receive the meeting link.
7.fullDescription:
We invite you to an online meeting for WO≈öP Barcelona volunteers! It's an excellent opportunity for those who cannot attend the in-person meeting.

During the online meeting:
‚Ä¢ You will meet the WO≈öP Barcelona organizing team
‚Ä¢ You will learn about current plans for the 34th Finale
‚Ä¢ You can ask questions and express your ideas
‚Ä¢ You will receive access to informational materials
‚Ä¢ You will meet other volunteers from all over Catalonia

üìù HOW TO JOIN:
To receive the meeting link, contact us through the contact form on the website. We will send you the meeting details and the platform link.

It's the ideal option for people who:
‚Ä¢ Live far from the center of Barcelona
‚Ä¢ Have limited time
‚Ä¢ Prefer online participation
‚Ä¢ Want to join the volunteer team

The meeting will be held on an online platform - you will receive details after contacting us.

8.title: Volunteer Meeting - Wawel
8.description: ü§ù WO≈öP Barcelona volunteer meeting at Wawel Restobar ‚Äî our main sponsor! Meet the team, taste Polish food and prepare for the 34th Finale.
8.fullDescription:
ü§ù WO≈öP Barcelona Volunteer Meeting at Wawel Restobar
We invite you to a WO≈öP Barcelona volunteer meeting at Wawel Restobar ‚Äî our main sponsor! It's the perfect place to get to know each other, chat and enjoy delicious Polish food and drinks straight from Poland.

During the meeting:
‚Ä¢ you will meet the WO≈öP Barcelona team
‚Ä¢ you will learn about plans for the 34th Finale
‚Ä¢ you can ask questions and share your ideas
‚Ä¢ you will receive informational materials
‚Ä¢ you will meet other volunteers from Barcelona, Catalonia and Poland

Why it's worth coming:
‚Ä¢ Wawel Restobar is a place created by Poles for Poles
‚Ä¢ you will eat traditional dishes and drink Polish beverages
‚Ä¢ you will feel the atmosphere of Polish hospitality
‚Ä¢ you will support a local WO≈öP sponsor

üìù How to join:
Come on the designated date or contact us if you have questions.

The meeting will be held at Wawel Restobar ‚Äî see you there!

5.title: 20th WO≈öP Run "Count Yourself with Diabetes"
5.description: Charity run for 5 km. Start and finish: Hotel W Barcelona (Barceloneta). ** ATTENTION: DATE AND START CHANGE!** The run will take place on SATURDAY 24.01.2026 starting from Hotel W Barcelona. Route along the beach, turnaround and return.
5.fullDescription:
Join the 20th WO≈öP Run "Count Yourself with Diabetes"! This is a charity run for 5 km through beautiful Barcelona.

üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è RUN DETAILS:
‚Ä¢ Distance: 5 km
‚Ä¢ Date: __**SATURDAY 24.01.2026**__ (changed due to weather)
‚Ä¢ Start/Meeting point: __Hotel W Barcelona__ (Barceloneta)
‚Ä¢ Route: along the beach, turnaround and return
‚Ä¢ Finish: Hotel W Barcelona (medal for every participant)

  **ATTENTION - DATE AND START LOCATION CHANGE!**  
Due to forecasted heavy rainfall and for participant safety, the run has been moved from 18.01 to __**SATURDAY 24.01.2026**__. The start and finish point has been set at Hotel W Barcelona.

üìû CONTACT THE ORGANIZERS:
If you have questions or problems, please contact us via chat or the run coordinator Aneta at +34 637 486 551.

Everyone is welcome to join the start, even without registration ‚Äî you can run with us, but only registered participants will receive official t-shirts.

1.title: 34th WO≈öP Finale in Barcelona
1.description: üéâ The biggest charity event of the year in Barcelona! Join us at Espacio 88 for a day full of workshops, performances, auctions and integration. We play for healthy tummies of Polish children!
1.fullDescription:
üéâ 34th WO≈öP Finale in Barcelona

üìç Location: Espacio 88 ‚Äî Carrer de Pamplona 88, Sant Mart√≠, Barcelona
üìÖ Date: January 25, 2026
üéØ Goal: purchase of modern equipment for diagnosing, monitoring and treating digestive tract diseases in children (pediatric endoscopes, imaging systems, functional testing equipment, etc.)

‚ú® What will happen?
The program is still being created, but the whole day at Espacio 88 will be full of activities:

ü´ß Workshop zones for children and families
‚Ä¢ games and activities by KosmoHisPlano
‚Ä¢ soap bubbles, movement, creativity
‚Ä¢ additional workshop stations

üéôÔ∏è Performances, panels and meetings
‚Ä¢ literary and artistic panels
‚Ä¢ meeting with artists and their works
‚Ä¢ family activities
‚Ä¢ cake from Delicious By Bea for all participants

üé≤ Games and integration
‚Ä¢ PL-ES game connecting Poles, Spaniards and the local community

üî® Charity auctions
‚Ä¢ auctions of unique items supporting the finale's goal

üéÜ Light to the Sky
‚Ä¢ traditional, positive gesture of unity and solidarity

üáµüá±‚ù§Ô∏è Polish culture in Barcelona
During the finale we promote Polish culture, language, creators and traditions ‚Äî creating a space where the Polish community, Spaniards and the international community can meet, co-create and get to know each other.

‚ù§Ô∏è Why do we play?
We raise funds to support the diagnosis and treatment of digestive tract diseases in children ‚Äî so that the youngest patients in Poland can benefit from the most modern equipment and better care.

9.title: End of Charity Auctions on Allegro
9.description: Last day to accept charity offers in the WO≈öP Action. Offers can be made from 01.12.2025 to 16.02.2026.
9.fullDescription:
This is the last day to accept charity offers on the Allegro platform as part of the 34th WO≈öP Finale!

üìÖ CHARITY AUCTION PERIOD:
Charity offers as part of the WO≈öP Action can be made from 01.12.2025 to 16.02.2026.

üíª HOW TO PARTICIPATE:
Click the "View auctions" button on the right, choose one of our auctions, place your bid and start bidding! All funds raised go to charity. Good luck!

üéØ FUNDRAISING GOAL:
All funds raised during charity auctions will be donated to support the diagnosis and treatment of digestive tract diseases in the youngest patients - the goal of the 34th WO≈öP Finale "Healthy tummies of our children".

‚è∞ LAST CHANCE:
This is the last day to participate in WO≈öP charity auctions on Allegro. Don't miss the opportunity to help children in need!

Thank you to everyone who participated in charity auctions over these 2+ months. Every zloty counts!

201.fullDescription:
19th WO≈öP Run "Count on Diabetes" in Barcelona!

We invite you to the 19th edition of the "Count on Diabetes" run with WO≈öP ‚Äì also in Barcelona!

üìÖ Date: Sunday, January 19, 2025
üïò Start: 10:30
üìç Meeting point: Sagrada Familia

This unique event is not just a run ‚Äì you can join however you want! Walking, on roller skates, by bike or jogging calmly ‚Äì the most important thing is to have fun together and support WO≈öP!

‚ú® Why is it worth signing up?
‚Ä¢ T-shirt from the 19th "Count on Diabetes" Run

Join us and let's show that Barcelona supports WO≈öP!

page.intro: Contact us ‚Äì we will gladly answer all your questions
page.volunteerDesc: We are looking for people willing to help organise events. Join our team and help with us!

footer.description: We are a dynamic Polish community in Barcelona organising WO≈öP finales and charity events for years.

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.description: Together we create good! This page presents the companies and institutions that support WO≈öP Barcelona. Thank you for every form of help.

cta.title: Want to become a sponsor or partner?
cta.subtitle: Get in touch ‚Äì we will prepare a tailored collaboration proposal.

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.description: Companies that financially support our activities and enable the organization of WO≈öP events in Barcelona.

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: Local companies and institutions that support our activities logistically, substantively and organizationally.

coorganizers.title: Co-organizers
coorganizers.description: Organizations and individuals who co-create and carry out the WO≈öP mission in Barcelona together with us.

bonaBarcelona.name: Bona Barcelona
bonaBarcelona.description: Polish travel agency in Catalonia creating unforgettable, personalized trips with passion. Offering comfortable accommodation, transfers, unique experiences, and individual sightseeing plans. Main destinations include Barcelona, Montserrat, Costa Brava, Tarragona, and Andorra. Fulfill your travel dreams with us ‚Äì comfortably and passionately!

krakoviak.name: Krakoviak
krakoviak.description: Polish Shop in Barcelona. This is a place you must visit when you miss traditional Polish products. Pierogi, cheeses, pickled cucumbers, cold cuts, cottage cheese, sour cream, homogenized cheeses, sausages, sticks and many other Polish specialties can be found right here! The shop is located right next to Sagrada Familia, on Sicilia Street. Additionally, Krakoviak is even open on Sunday, when other shops are closed ‚Äì a perfect place for shopping at any time!

artTur.name: ART-TUR
artTur.description: Transport Poland Spain. ART-TUR is a transport company operating since 1993, offering safe and comfortable 9-person bus transport. Thanks to a reliable fleet and experienced drivers, we enjoy the trust of numerous regular clients. Our priority is the satisfaction and comfort of passengers. We invite you to use our services and join the group of satisfied customers.

deliciasByBea.name: Delicias by Bea
deliciasByBea.description: Polish confectionery in Barcelona. Bea Michalak is an experienced confectioner who combines traditional flavors of Polish cuisine with modern confectionery techniques. She developed her passion for baking since childhood and perfected it in Berlin and Barcelona. Today, in the heart of the Gothic district of Barcelona, she creates exceptional pastries inspired by both family traditions and multicultural surroundings.

polcat.name: PolCat
polcat.description: PolCat is a travel agency with almost 20 years of experience, specializing in organizing trips, transfers and comprehensive tourist services for individual clients and groups. The company has gained recognition for its flexibility, professionalism and individual approach, which guarantee satisfaction with every journey. PolCat provides unforgettable experiences in the most attractive places.

spaParaMascota.name: Spa para mascota Peluqueria canina y felina
spaParaMascota.description: We have something special for you (and your four-legged friends)! The newly opened grooming salon @spa_para_mascota from Badalona joins the group of partners of the 34th WO≈öP Barcelona Finale! TWO VOUCHERS are up for auction at the Finale: a grooming session FOR A SMALL DOG and a grooming session FOR A MEDIUM DOG. This is a perfect opportunity to test the services of this modern salon and give your friend a moment of relaxation. Location: Sant Isidre Street 60, Badalona. Service: after prior appointment on the agreed date and time.

tomexCarBus.name: Tomex Car-Bus
tomexCarBus.description: Specialist in mechanics, electrics, air conditioning and suspensions in Catalonia. Comprehensive automatic transmission oil changes, fast and professional engine repair or replacement. Vehicle mechanics workshop in Santa Eug√®nia de Berga offering a wide range of services: general mechanics, electrics, air conditioning service, oil, filter and fluid changes, as well as suspension, brake and shock absorber repairs. Specializes in servicing passenger cars, vans, trucks up to 3.5 tons, and also deals with the purchase and sale of buses and cars.

wawelRestobar.name: Wawel RestoBar
wawelRestobar.description: Polish restaurant in Barcelona. A little piece of Poland in the heart of Barcelona. Here you can order perfectly prepared pierogi, soup and sausages. The chefs prepare delicious pancakes, apple pie and other Polish specialties. According to guests, the beer tastes excellent here.

domiWKatalonii.name: Domi w Katalonii
domiWKatalonii.description: Travel blogger Dominika Barska, who writes about Barcelona and Catalonia, offering guides and tips for tourists.

solDeGracia.name: Sol de Gracia
solDeGracia.description: The best craft beer shop in Barcelona. Sol de Gracia is a craft beer shop with the largest selection in all of Barcelona. Come choose your favorite beer, we guarantee that if we don't have it, it probably doesn't exist.

laMagiaSabores.name: La Magia de los Sabores
laMagiaSabores.description: Polish Food Truck for sweet and savory. Food Truck Magia Smak√≥w offers: Polish sausage with grilled caramelized onion, Polish panini with mushrooms and cheese, homemade Kentucky nuggets, Kentucky burgers, grilled beef burgers, Roman cakes. Ko≈Çacze (chimney cakes) in various flavors: cinnamon, coconut, nut and colorful candies. You can add Nutella or cream to the Ko≈Çacz, depending on the customer's preference. Also chips, soft drinks, beer, rum and coffee.

kosmoHisplano.name: Kosmo HisPLano Educational Association
kosmoHisplano.description: Invites the youngest residents of Barcelona, especially children and youth from Polish families, to participate in exciting extracurricular activities. The organization focuses on enriching language skills and expanding knowledge about Poland.

worldClassBarcelona.name: World Class Barcelona
worldClassBarcelona.description: Spanish language school in Barcelona. A local, vibrant and enthusiastic school offering engaging classes and exciting activities. They build a great community of students and teachers who support each other, share their passions and enjoy Barcelona. They offer intensive Spanish language courses in the center of Barcelona.

donate.title: Donate Online
donate.subtitle: We will soon launch an online fundraiser for the 34th WO≈öP Finale.
donate.goalDescription: We play to support the diagnosis and treatment of gastrointestinal diseases in the youngest patients. This is real support for approximately 1.2‚Äì1.5 million children suffering from gastroenterological conditions.
donate.whyImportantText1: Pediatric gastroenterology in Poland faces a growing number of patients and the need for modern equipment that improves diagnostic and treatment outcomes, including in surgery.
donate.whyImportantText2: Gastrointestinal diseases in children (e.g., celiac disease, Crohn's disease, ulcerative colitis, GERD, severe food allergies, pancreatic and liver diseases) and nutritional disorders (malnutrition and obesity) are increasingly common and affect the development, immunity, and daily functioning of the youngest.
donate.collectionTitle: The fundraiser has not started yet
donate.collectionText: We are not yet collecting donations for the 34th WO≈öP Finale. We will start accepting donations in December.

socials.title: Join us
socials.description: We are on Facebook, Instagram, Meetup and YouTube.
socials.facebookDesc: See what's new. Updates, photos and event reports.
socials.instagramDesc: Latest photos and stories from our activities in Barcelona.
socials.meetupDesc: Join our events and meetings of the Polish community.
socials.youtubeDesc: Watch our videos and event reports from WO≈öP Barcelona.

runRoutePopup.title: Run date has been changed
runRoutePopup.message: Attention: run date change due to forecasted heavy rainfall and for participant safety. The run will take place on SATURDAY 24.01.2026. The start and finish are now at Hotel W Barcelona. The route goes along the beach, then turns around and returns to the finish at Hotel W.
